edu.ucla.wise.commons

Class Directive

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.ucla.wise.commons.PageItem
      • edu.ucla.wise.commons.Directive

  • public class Directive
extends PageItem
    This class is a subclass of Page_Item and represents a directive object on the page.
